main.name: Vraj Patel
main.description: I work on every part of the stack
main.bio: As a Senior Software Developer with over 7 years of experience and a Master's degree in Computer Science, I specialize in building scalable, high-performance web applications using Java, Spring Boot, React.js, and AWS. Currently, I work at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) as a Lead Application Developer for the Bank of Montreal, where I contribute to the development of enterprise-grade financial applications. I have a proven track record of delivering complex software solutions for high-profile clients, leading cross-functional teams, and managing projects from concept to deployment. Passionate about clean code and cloud-native architecture, I continuously seek to improve systems through best practices, automation, and innovation
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for any working opportunities.

education.degree: Master's of Science in Computer Science

education.school: Charotar University of Science and Technology

work.title: SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
work.description: Led the Customer Financial Module migration with 2 developers, using Spring Boot for backend and React for frontend, converting TIBCO-based XML SOAP requests to JSON REST APIs; resolved production issues, prepared design documentation, implemented new features, and coordinated integration efforts across multiple teams.Managed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins for automated builds, tests, and deployments, improving deployment efficiency by 40% and reducing release errors.Collaborated with cross-functional teams in release planning calls, managed feature/release branches, conducted code reviews, and ensured smooth deployments to production

work.title: SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
work.description: â€¢ Designed and developed a website for a small business, incorporating secure user authentication, an integrated payment gateway, and location tracking, utilizing a diverse technology stack to meet specific client requirements.Built a web application with NFC card integration and inbuilt login functionality using Spring Boot (JWT Token Validation) and React. Deployed on AWS (EC2, RDS, Elastic IP, and Load Balancer), achieving a 30% improvement in deployment efficiency.Implemented user registration and configuration features for landing pages and portfolios, including card type selection and PayPal Checkout integration, resulting in 300+ new user sign-ups.Developed data conversion functionality into .vcf card format for 'SAVE CONTACT' on Apple/Android devices, facilitating seamless contact saving for over 500 users.Configured GoDaddy SSL certificate on AWS EC2, enhancing website security and reducing security incidents by 50%.Mapped and integrated core pages (Homepage, Login, Register, Dashboard, Payment, Contact Us) into the portal, streamlining user navigation and improving overall user experience.Integrated REST API (Google Cloud API) for accurate real-time location tracking with clock-in/clock-out features, reporting, and access control for 200+ employees, enhancing operational efficiency and data accuracy

work.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
work.description: Designed a cloud-native website according to client specifications using React, Ajax, jQuery, SCSS/Bootstrap for the front end, and Java Spring Framework for the back end with MYSQL database.Converted a 1,600-page static rulebook into a dynamic single-page module using database designs and K-means clustering, resulting in a 70% reduction in page load times and improved data handling.Integrated AWS S3 for file uploads/downloads and implemented payment gateway integration and authentication with Android's REST APIs, streamlining transaction processes and improving security

work.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
work.description: Migrated a static Java backend to a dynamic Spring backend, utilizing JSON for data transfer, and established a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment on Jenkins, reducing deployment time by 25%.Integrated digital and manual government forms into a unified dashboard, streamlining document management and data retrieval for municipal services

work.title: ASSOCIATE SYSTEM ENGINEER INTERN
work.description: Designed and optimized RESTful APIs, improving data efficiency between front-end and back-end by 35%.Conducted unit testing using JUnit for Java applications, improving code quality and reducing defects by 15% across multiple projects.Guided users through the SDLC phases, from system implementation to ongoing maintenance, ensuring effective adoption

work.title: SOFTWARE ENGINEER INTERN
work.description: Developed PHP webpages for a WordPress website.Contributed towards requirement gathering from customers.

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Vraj Patel, and I can confidently say that their expertise and dedication were invaluable. Vraj consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic, exceptional problem-solving skills, and a collaborative spirit. Their ability to think creatively and drive results significantly contributed to our project's success. I highly recommend Vraj for any future endeavors.
testimonials.user: Riddhi Patel, Data Engineer at Anblicks

testimonials.text: Vraj Patel has an impressive ability to troubleshoot complex issues and implement innovative solutions, ensuring that our projects are delivered on time and exceed expectations.
testimonials.user: Okery Liu, Blockchain | Event | Gold Concentrate Procurement

testimonials.text: I had the pleasure of working with Vraj at TCS, where he was an excellent full stack developer. He has deep knowledge of Java and Spring Boot, and his skills were crucial in our DGCA project. Vraj's experience with AWS services made our project run smoothly and efficiently. He is great at integrating different technologies and creating high-quality applications. Vraj is not only technically skilled but also a great team player. He is dedicated, solves problems quickly, and always goes the extra mile. His hard work and innovative ideas were a big asset to our team. I highly recommend Vraj for any role that requires expertise in Java, Spring Boot, and AWS. He will be a valuable addition to any team.
testimonials.user: Manoj Shah, Senior Software Engineer at Cognizant
